{{refimprove|date=February 2012}} {{infobox television | show_name = 24: Conspiracy | image = | caption = | runtime = 24 minutes total, 1 minute each episode | creator = Marc Ostrick and Eric Neal Young | composer = John Massari | starring = [[Dylan Bruce]]
Beverly Bryant
[[Steve Kramer (actor)|Steve Kramer]]
Amy Rider | country = [[United States|USA]] | network = [[VCast|Verizon]] }} '''''24: Conspiracy''''' is a low-budget, [[mobile phone|mobile]]-only [[Spin-off (media)|spin-off]] of the television [[drama]] program ''[[24 (TV series)|24]]''. It was released on January 30, 2005, after the premiere of the [[24 (season 4)|fourth season]] and was released in three-day intervals. It is the first [[mobisode]] [[Fox Broadcasting Company|FOX]] released. Set in [[Washington D.C]], it takes place over twenty-four non-linear one-minute episodes, and it appears to take place during Day 4, as indicated by a reference to the Heller kidnapping by James Sutton happening that day. The 24 minutes of the show do not happen in real time; instead each minute takes place at a different given time in the day. ==Product history== ''Conspiracy'' was first announced on November 10, 2004, revealing that new actors and characters would be used, set during the show's [[24 (season 4)|fourth season]].{{cite web | author = Kimberly Potts |title = "24" Phones Home| work = E! Online |date = 2004-11-10| url = http://au.eonline.com/uberblog/b48630_24_phones_home.html| accessdate = 2006-09-02}} ==Availability== Originally released as a mobisode, ''Conspiracy'' is available in various countries, but has been made available online through [[music download|digital download]] and [[Warez|piracy]]. In DVD Regions 1 and Regions 4, the full 24 episodes are available on DVD, and are also available on cell phone providers, [[Vodafone]] [[3G]] in the United Kingdom, Vodafone K.K. in [[Japan]], [[Orange (Israel)|Orange]] in [[Israel]], CTI Movil in Argentina and [[Verizon Wireless]] in the [[United States]]. ==Cast== *[[Dylan Bruce]] as Martin Kail *Beverly Bryant as Susan Walker *[[Steve Kramer (actor)|Steve Kramer]] as James Sutton *Amy Rider as Kelly ==Producers and directors== *Gary Newman (Producer) *Steven Melnick (Producer) *Mitch Feinman (Producer) *Lucy Hood (Producer) *Eric Young (Director) *Marc Ostrick (Director) ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *{{IMDb title|id=0449543|title=24: Conspiracy}} *[http://www.emmyonline.org/emmy/daytime_new_media_nominations.html Emmy nomination with viewing possibility] {{24 (TV series)}} [[Category:24 (TV series)]] [[Category:Mobile telephone video series]]
